explains: adj. 好客的，热情友好的；环境适宜的；乐于接受的

sentences.en: The locals are hospitable and welcoming.
The man is very hospitable; he keeps open house for his friends and fellow-workers.
sentences.cn: 那人十分好客，无论是他的朋友还是同事，他都盛情接待。

sentences.en: The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home.
sentences.cn: 作者认为她的朋友做出了一个理性的决定，选择了一个更好客的地方，而不是一个表面上优雅的辅助生活的家。
